pullRequest.title: Sample and readme updates
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I have read the [contribution guidelines] (https://github.com/Azure/azure-iot-sdk-java/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md).
 I added or modified the existing tests to cover the change (we do not allow our test coverage to go down).
If this is a modification that impacts the behavior of a public API

 I edited the corresponding document in the devdoc folder and added or modified requirements.


I submitted this PR against the correct branch:

 This pull-request is submitted against the master branch.



Reference/Link to the issue solved with this PR (if any)

Updated readmes
Did some package refactoring so that customized code is in customized folder
Added try catch in sample to catch error when device sample is no not running
For async sample, the thread was prematurely ending and not printing results so added latch to wait

nodes.bodyText:
👍
For update, don't we need something similar?
I'll rearrange this one to be below src code generation
